cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-6909

description: formbankcgi.exe in Fersch Formbankserver 1.9, when the PATH_INFO begins with Abfrage, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via multiple requests containing many /../ sequences in the Name parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-6910

description: SQL injection vulnerability in search.asp in Digitizing Quote And Ordering System 1.0 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the ordernum parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-6911

description: SQL injection vulnerability in phpMyFAQ 1.6.7 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors, possibly the userfile or filename parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-6912

description: Unspecified vulnerability in phpMyFAQ 1.6.7 and earlier allows remote attackers to upload arbitrary PHP scripts via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-6913

description: Unspecified vulnerability in ftpd in IBM AIX 5.2.0 and 5.3.0 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information, including passwords, via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-6914

description: ftpd in IBM AIX 5.2.0 and 5.3.0 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (port exhaustion) via unspecified vectors. NOTE: some details were obtained from third party sources.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-6915

description: Getahead Direct Web Remoting (DWR) before 1.1.3 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via unknown vectors related to "crafted input."
